PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-07782017-06-20,  ,  ,  ESDC, 
ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to introduce the new national progressive eligibility thresholds for Canada Student Grant for Full-Time Students to ensure that more students benefit from up-front, non-repayable student financial assistance each year.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0126 Publication Date: 2017-07-12
AttachmentsAttachment
